t: New Master Sounds - New Master Sounds [VINYL] - Amazon.com Music
s: I've been following The New Mastersounds since 2007 and this is my favorite album to date. The added horns and 2 vocal guests, Cleve Freckleton and Sulene Fleming, really fatten up and add to an already talented band. If you like 60s and 70s R&B, funk and or jazz you really need to buy this album.

t: Amazon.com: Re: Mixed: CDs & Vinyl
s: The premise for "Re:Mixed" is to take the organic music of the New Mastersounds and remix it. So the album consists of New Mastersounds chestnuts that have been digitally rearranged. Think of projects like the Blue Break Beats series.
